lead_paragraph: Manchester City won 4-0 at West Bromwich Albion to end Pep Guardiola's worst run as a manager and stay on top of the Premier League table on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Man City, Arsenal, Liverpool Hit Four as Mourinho Suffers
headline.main: Man City, Arsenal, Liverpool Hit Four as Mourinho Suffers

snippet: Manchester City won 4-0 at West Bromwich Albion to end Pep Guardiola's worst run as a manager and stay on top of the Premier League table on Saturday....
